metadata.name: EMWAY
metadata.description:
'EMWAY' is a Fantasy landscape art with beautiful Northern Lights! It is my first ever artwork to contain a night landscape with beautiful dancing waves of light, known as Aurora. The title of this artwork 'EMWAY' just came to my mind all of a sudden while thinking about fantasy names. The beautiful night landscape with the fantasy and dreamy vibes is accompanied by beautiful dancing waves of light that have captivated people for millennia! So, embrace the beauty of this spectacular light show!

MEDIUM: Digital 2d Art || YEAR: 2021 || DIMENSIONS: 4000*5600px (base x height) || DEPTH: 600ppi (24-bit) || COLOR SCHEME: sRGB

Project Details:
